choosefavorite.message: Select your favorite search engines and continue searching with one click only.

contextmenusettings.description: used in context menu for the settings button

err_includehttp.message: The search link has to start with 'http'.

err_nonameandsearchlink.message: Insert name and search link of the new search engine.

err_nosearchkey.message: The search link has to include {SEARCH}

err_nosearchlink.message: Insert search link of the new search engine

locale.description: used to send the uninstall url in the correct language

newname.description: used for name placeholder in add new modal
newname.message: Name of the new search engine

newsearchlink.description: used for search link placeholder in add new modal

nosearchengineschosen.description: used in popup when no search engines were chosen to use
nosearchengineschosen.message:
No search engines were selected. 
Go to settings to select your favorite 
 search engines for quick search

popupsettingsbutton.description: used in popup for the settings button

question.message:
How to insert your search link:

  1. Go to the main page of your search engine.

  2. Type the term {SEARCH} and press enter.

  3. Copy the link from your address bar into 
      the input box of this form.

savebtn.description: used in add new modal to for saving the input

searchwithbeginning.description: used in popup form placeholder, at the beginning of the sentence

searchwithend.description: used in popup form placeholder, at the end of the sentence

standardcaption.description: used to set standard search engine

standardengine.message: The first active search engine will be set as standard for your searches in the address bar.

whichsearchengine.message: Which search engines are you using?
